body_html:
I also got this error with the same traceback on the following code:

import tensorflow as tf

ph = tf.placeholder(tf.float32)
ta = tf.TensorArray(dtype=tf.float32, size=1).write(0, ph)
ind, (ta,) = tf.while_loop(
    lambda i, _: i < 1,
    lambda i, tas: [i + 1, tas],
    [tf.constant(0, dtype=tf.int32), [ta]],
    parallel_iterations=1,
)
y = ta.read(0)
with tf.control_dependencies([y]):
    gs = tf.gradients(y, [ph])
with tf.Session() as ss:
    ss.run([y, gs], feed_dict={ph: 0})

Interestingly, with parallel_iterations=2 there is no error.

import tensorflow as tf

ph = tf.placeholder(tf.float32)
ta = tf.TensorArray(dtype=tf.float32, size=1).write(0, ph)

y = ta.read(0)
with tf.control_dependencies([y]):
    gs = tf.gradients(y, [ph])
with tf.Session() as ss:
    ss.run([y, gs], feed_dict={ph: 0})

Interestingly, with parallel_iterations=2 there is no error.
body:
I also got this error with the same traceback on the following code:
```
import tensorflow as tf

ph = tf.placeholder(tf.float32)
ta = tf.TensorArray(dtype=tf.float32, size=1).write(0, ph)
ind, (ta,) = tf.while_loop(
    lambda i, _: i < 1,
    lambda i, tas: [i + 1, tas],
    [tf.constant(0, dtype=tf.int32), [ta]],
    parallel_iterations=1,
)
y = ta.read(0)
with tf.control_dependencies([y]):
    gs = tf.gradients(y, [ph])
with tf.Session() as ss:
    ss.run([y, gs], feed_dict={ph: 0})
```
Interestingly, with `parallel_iterations=2` there is no error.
